00032 #pragma once
00033 
00034 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00035 #include <thrust/iterator/detail/zip_iterator_base.h>
00036 #include <thrust/detail/type_traits.h>
00037 
00038 namespace thrust
00039 {
00040 
00138 template <typename IteratorTuple>
00139   class zip_iterator
00140     : public detail::zip_iterator_base<IteratorTuple>::type
00141 {
00142   public:
00145     inline __host__ __device__
00146     zip_iterator(void);
00147 
00153     inline __host__ __device__
00154     zip_iterator(IteratorTuple iterator_tuple);
00155 
00161     template<typename OtherIteratorTuple>
00162     inline __host__ __device__
00163     zip_iterator(const zip_iterator<OtherIteratorTuple> &other,
00164                  typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible<
00165                    OtherIteratorTuple,
00166                    IteratorTuple
00167                  >::type * = 0);
00168 
00175     inline __host__ __device__
00176     const IteratorTuple &get_iterator_tuple() const;
00177 
00180   private:
00181     typedef typename
00182     detail::zip_iterator_base<IteratorTuple>::type super_t;
00183 
00184     friend class experimental::iterator_core_access;
00185 
00186     // Dereferencing returns a tuple built from the dereferenced
00187     // iterators in the iterator tuple.
00188     __host__ __device__
00189     typename super_t::reference dereference() const;
00190 
00191     // Two zip_iterators are equal if the two first iterators of the
00192     // tuple are equal. Note this differs from Boost's implementation, which
00193     // considers the entire tuple.
00194     template<typename OtherIteratorTuple>
00195     inline __host__ __device__
00196     bool equal(const zip_iterator<OtherIteratorTuple> &other) const;
00197 
00198     // Advancing a zip_iterator means to advance all iterators in the tuple
00199     inline __host__ __device__
00200     void advance(typename super_t::difference_type n);
00201 
00202     // Incrementing a zip iterator means to increment all iterators in the tuple
00203     inline __host__ __device__
00204     void increment();
00205 
00206     // Decrementing a zip iterator means to decrement all iterators in the tuple
00207     inline __host__ __device__
00208     void decrement();
00209 
00210     // Distance is calculated using the first iterator in the tuple.
00211     template<typename OtherIteratorTuple>
00212     inline __host__ __device__
00213       typename super_t::difference_type
00214         distance_to(const zip_iterator<OtherIteratorTuple> &other) const;
00215 
00216     // The iterator tuple.
00217     IteratorTuple m_iterator_tuple;
00218 
00221 }; // end zip_iterator
00222 
00231 template<typename IteratorTuple>
00232 inline __host__ __device__
00233 zip_iterator<IteratorTuple> make_zip_iterator(IteratorTuple t);
00234 
00241 } // end thrust
